sentences.en: City manager Stuart Pearce refused to criticise Styles for missing Drogba's infringement.
sentences.cn: 曼城主帅皮尔斯拒绝评论裁判对德罗巴手球的疏忽.

sentences.en: Far be it from me to criticise, but shouldn't their mother take a share of the blame?
sentences.cn: 不是我要挑理，他们的母亲难道就不应该负点责任吗？

sentences.en: Gaffer Sir Alex Ferguson also recently refused to criticise Rooney.
sentences.cn: 老爷子也拒绝批评鲁尼.

sentences.en: HE CAN CRITICISE ME A BIT , THAT'S NORMAL, BUT HE ALSO GIVES ME GOOD ADVICE.
sentences.cn: 他会给我一些批评, 那很正常但他同时也会给我好的建议.

sentences.en: Hold that tongue before jumping in to criticise because secretly you've harboured competitive feelings.
sentences.cn: 管住舌头,不要急于批评,因为这样你就可以偷偷掩盖自己的竞争性情绪.

sentences.en: However, more orthodox physicians have started to criticise Yang's authoritarian approach.
sentences.cn: 然而, 更多的主流心理学家开始批评杨的专制方法.

sentences.en: If you or your partner criticise each other habitually, you are attacking their personality.
sentences.cn: 如果你或你的伴侣习惯性地批评对方，其实你们是在攻击对方的人格。

sentences.en: It is not your place to criticise or suggest improvements!
sentences.cn: 提出批评或给予改进建议并不是你的责任!

sentences.en: Let the imagination run, and criticise it for yourself, after it has its fling.
sentences.cn: 最好是充满想像力地尝试后, 然后自己批评自己的作品.

sentences.en: Researchers must not unjustifiably criticise or disparage other Researchers.
sentences.cn: 研究人员不能不公正地批评或贬损其他研究人员.

sentences.en: Salihamidzic later went on to criticise Mourinho and declaring the title race over.
sentences.cn: 国米主教练穆里尼奥不久前宣称联赛冠军争夺战已经结束.

sentences.en: She does not criticise rivals who make toys there.
sentences.cn: 她并不批评那些在中国生产玩具的竞争对手.

sentences.en: The more we criticise a nation in motion the less we have to say about our own sad lost little island.
sentences.cn: 我们对运转中的国家的批评越多，我们就能更少地谈到我们所在的迷失的小岛。

sentences.en: These papers found it to their advantage, during the unpopularity of Darling, to criticise severely the acts of that Governor, who was defended by the Gazette with intemperate zeal.
sentences.cn: 这两份报纸发现，基于达令总督的不得人心，他们拥有一大优势：严词批评总督的法令，和《公报》的过分阿谀拍马对着干。

sentences.en: Using its tenets to criticise China is, they claim, sheer hypocrisy.
sentences.cn: 利用这个原则对中国吹毛求疵, 他们宣称, 这是完全的伪善.

sentences.en: We have not said that no one should criticise us … I welcome criticism.
sentences.cn: 我们没有说人们不能批评我们……我欢迎批评。

sentences.en: We would not criticise religion or religious freedom.
sentences.cn: 我们不会批评宗教或者宗教自由。

sentences.en: Well, you should pay for it. Criticise me.
sentences.cn: 恩, 你得为这付出代价. 批评我吧.

sentences.en: You can criticise him until you're blue in the face, but you'll never change his personality.
sentences.cn: 即使你苦口婆心地批评他，也改变不了他的个性。

sentences.en: You criticise was of effect for him.
sentences.cn: 你的批评对他起作用了.
